This is the Stand Alone Electrical Permit commercial and residential. 
Please apply here for Solar Systems, Battery, meter upgrade, Generator, LED lighting, etc

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description:
Use this permit application for Residential new construction, additions or remodels of homes, apartment buildings, condominiums and townhouses.
NOT SOLAR

recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this permit application for all Commercial/Business or Mixed Use properties for new construction, Tenant Improvements or Additions to buildings.
